name: BS Super Mario World
overview: BS SUPER MARIO WORLD is a hypothetical "what if" - a proposed expansion of the original Super Mario World for the Japanese-Exclusive Satellaview. This makes it unique for a few reasons. Firstly, it utilizes a timer mechanic seen in most Satellaview games of that period. What that means for the player is that you have a limited amount of time to complete this "Broadcast". Specifically, 60 minutes are given to the player before being sent to a results screen and given a rank. Of course, if you complete the levels before that time limit, you reach that screen anyways, but at least you have some bragging rights ;). 60 minutes also may seem like a lot for this demo, but do note that each broadcast only gets harder from here! I also heard there's a new powerup or two...
